title: SCP-2401-Alpha

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to sting a player, Dealing a poweful attack
- Use 2 bees to investigate a player and find their role.
- Use 3 bees to grant Invincible defense to all SCPs for the night. May only be used twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
For each SCP that dies, you will permanently earn one additional bee per night.
For all mechanical purposes, this role is considered to be a beekeeper-type role (=beekeeper)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent the Foundation from recontaining you and your hive at all costs

desc:
Post 2748
*The female host also undergoes rapid changes to both accommodate and protect SCP-2401 which include increased tissue regeneration, higher amphetamine output, and lack of dependency for food or water. In the majority of cases the female host retains their personality and memories which usually results in psychological trauma related with the ongoing symbiosis of SCP-2401. This is seen to result in a high rate of suicide in cases where the host outright rejects symbiosis.*
